name: ITP 3 - Earthworks Bulk Fill and Testing
template name: ITP 3 - Earthworks Bulk Fill and Testing

name: 1 - Topsoil
1.1 - Cut to Stockpile

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 700 m3 of topsoil solid measure as excavated for future landscaping use by the Principal to be permanently stockpiled an area to be agreed with the Principals Representative to the south of the BESS Platform, within the clean water diversion bund shown on drawing BESS-UZA-DS-01-60.
FREQUENCY: BESS Platform and Laydown Areas, roads and drains.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Load Count Documentation/Topographical survey before and after
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: W
1.2 - Cut to Stockpile
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor is free to use any suitable location within the Contractor’s Working Area for temporary stockpiling of earthworks materials during the Works
FREQUENCY: BESS Platform and Laydown Areas, roads and drains.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: W
2 - Unsuitable Material
2.1 - Cut to Waste

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Unsuitable material shall be stripped cleanly off the existing surface in all areas to be cut or filled to permanent stockpile areas for unsuitable material are to be agreed with the Principals Representative and are likely to be to the south of the BESS Platform, within the clean water diversion bund shown on drawing BESS-UZA-DS-01-60.
FREQUENCY: BESS Platform and Laydown Areas, roads, and drains.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: W
2.2 - Cut to Waste
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Removal of a stripping layer 100mm below existing ground
FREQUENCY: BESS Platform and Laydown Areas, and roads
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
3 - Subgrade of BESS Platform and Laydown Area
3.1 - Initial Testing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: To be tested initially using a scala penetrometer.
• A minimum of 3 blows/100mm except where the level of ground is at or below existing water table.
• To be done in fill or at grade areas only; areas with more than 300mm to be cut to be tested once at subgrade level.
• Ignore the first 300mm of testing results.
• Low areas to have water and organic material removed and replaced with dry sand immediately after excavation.
FREQUENCY: 20x20m grid
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: QF 021.A Scala Penetrometer Test Sheet.
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H
HOLD POINT
3.2 - Testing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: To be tested using a scala penetrometer.
• To be tested every 0.5m of lift.
• If using native material, no less than 3 blows/100mm.
• If using imported material, minimum blows/100mm to be determined during the compaction trial by the Principal’s Representative.
• Top 300mm of final subgrade level to be tested once geotextile and confining layer has been placed on top.
FREQUENCY: 20x20m grid
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: QF 021.A Scala Penetrometer Test Sheet.
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H
HOLD POINT
3.3 - Testing under O&M Building and Fire Water Tanks
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: To be tested using a scala penetrometer.
• If using native material, no less than 3 blows/100mm.
• If using imported material, minimum blows/100mm to be determined during the compaction trial by the Principal’s Representative.
FREQUENCY: 10x10m grid
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: QF 021.A Scala Penetrometer Test Sheet.
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H
HOLD POINT
3.4 - Proof rolling
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subgrade to be ‘proof rolled’ using an 8-10 ton steel-wheeled roller or other approved heavy plant once at subgrade level in the presence of the Principal’s Representative.
• Any unsuitable material to be removed down to suitable and backfilled to subgrade.
FREQUENCY: As constructed
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H, Principal’s Representative
HOLD POINT
4 - Subgrade of Access Road
4.1 - Subgrade Testing
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Tested using a scala penetrometer. No less than 3 blows/100mm.
FREQUENCY: Every 10m alternating sides
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: QF 021.A Scala Penetrometer Test Sheet.
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H
HOLD POINT
4.2 - Proof Rolling
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subgrade to be ‘proof rolled’ using an 8-10 ton steel-wheeled roller or other approved heavy plant once at subgrade level in the presence of the Principal’s Representative.
• Any unsuitable material to be removed down to suitable and backfilled to subgrade.
FREQUENCY: As constructed
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H, Principal’s Representative
HOLD POINT
4.3 - Subgrade Finish Level
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subgrade to be taken to +50mm above finished subgrade level before overlaying with geotextile and subbase material.
• Final subgrade level to be measured using a stringline by digging through subbase material.
• Final subgrade level to be no more than 10mm above and 30mm below design level.
FREQUENCY: At 20m chainage intervals before overlaying with geotextile.
• At 20m chainage intervals after overlaying with geotextile and subbase material.
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: QF 023 Stringline Test Report
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: H, Principal’s Representative
HOLD POINT
5 - Cut to Fill
5.1 - Cut to Fill from Borrow Site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Fill material shall be cut from the Borrow Site stockpile and transported to the BESS site.  It shall be directly placed on site and be ready for spreading
FREQUENCY: Per load
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: W
5.2 - Batters

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Fill batters shall be overfilled to ensure the material at the prescribed final batter surface shown on the drawings is properly compacted. Overfill material shall be trimmed off and incorporated in the fill as the filling proceeds.
FREQUENCY: As constructed
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET: Visual Inspection
INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY: Internal Project Engineer / Project Manager
CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY: W
